title: 302. Why Learn Esperanto?
description: A language invented in the 19th century, and meant to be universal, it never really caught on. So why does a group of Esperantists from around the world gather once a year to celebrate their bond?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: A language invented in the 19th century, and meant to be universal, it never really caught on. So why does a group of Esperantists from around the world gather once a year to celebrate their bond?
